resources.string: Listener disabled - tap button to enable
Connection failed. Check URL and network.

1. Enter your backend URL
2. Tap "Enable Notification Listener" and enable it in settings
3. Tap "Enable Accessibility Service" and enable it in settings
4. Return to this app
5. Test connection

The app will now capture FOMO notifications, extract contract addresses, and send them to your backend.
Allows FomoFaster to automatically capture contract addresses from FOMO notifications by interacting with the FOMO app.
